SignerName.description: This is the name of the borrower or the signer, not the vendor/agent.

Email.description: This is the email of the borrower or the signer, not the vendor/agent

PhoneNumber.description: This is the phone number of each signer

IsTheSignerAForeignNational?.description: Is the signer of this closing confirmation a foreign national

PropertyAddress.description: The complete address of the property for this loan, including street, city, and postal code.

AppointmentAddress.description: This is the address where the closing confirmation was signed

AppointmentDateAndTime.description: The date on which the closing confirmation was signed

FileNumber.description: Any file numbers associated with the closing confirmation

OrderOnBehalfOf.description: The name of the person on whose behalf this closing confirmation is being signed

CompanyFee.description: This is the fee charged by the loan company in dollars

AgentName.description: The name of the agent or vendor responsible for the closing confirmation

AgentFee.description: The fee charged by the agent in dollars, if applicable.

WitnessNumber.description: The number of witnesses for the signing of this closing confirmation

UploadFiles.description: If any files were uploaded as part of this closing confirmation

InternalNotes.description: Any internal notes or instructions present in this closing confirmation, these maybe present as comments, but the instructions will be directed at the vendor/agent and not intended for the signer/borrower.

ExternalNotes.description: any external notes or instructions added to this closing confirmation, these maybe present as comments, but the notes will be directed at the borrower or signer.

InstructionType.description: the type of instructions added to this closing confirmation

ScanBacksNeeded.description: whether any scan backs are needed for this closing confirmaton
